textBox.richText: New Listing in Park Hill The picture above shows my new listing in North Park Hill. Priced at $243,000, this 3 bed, 2 bath home is perfect and move in ready. On a large lot, this gem boasts 1,630 square foot of extensively remodeled and updated modern living. A rare master suite with private bath and study have a separate walk out to back yard. The chef’s kitchen is perfect for entertaining. New plumbing, new roof, fresh paint and hardwood floors- call me if you’d like to check it out. To see more photos, visit: http://www.spotlighthometours.com/tours/tour.cfm?tourid=26280 FHA Loans- Major Change Coming! The monthly mortgage insurance premium required for FHA loans will undergo a significant increase (.25%) for loans given case numbers after April 18, 2011.  To put it in perspective, if your loan will be valued at $250,000, this will mean your monthly payment will increase over $50 a month! For some, this will mean that a conventional loan with mortgage insurance will be a better way to go.  You may want to consider changing your timeline to purchase if you had considered making a purchase this spring. The Denver Market in review Homes sales have now been exceeding new inventory for several weeks in both the condo and single family market.  Market prices have not yet moved higher as excess inventory is moved as it has still been a buyer’s market.  However, as this trend continues, we will likely see upward pressure on pricing.  Currently, the average days on market for a home is 149, for a condo, 181 days.  In February in the entire Denver metro area, 1770 homes and 459 condos were sold.
